alert.note: Alert for Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 10 at 4:51PM MST until January 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and strong winds possible. Snow accumulations in the valleys of 3 to 8 inches possible Friday with 5 to 10 inches possible Saturday. Wind gusts to 50 mph possible Friday. Wind gusts to 30 mph possible Saturday. * WHERE...Albion, Almo, Malta, Rockland, and Holbrook. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
